item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Tuesday, September 10, 2024 at 1:20 PM UTC
item.description:

8. not quite buildless (11 points | 7 comments)
9. Nobody Cares About Security (22 points | 15 comments)
10. Apple Event for September 9th, 2024 (38 points | 8 comments)
11. In the Trenches: What it Means to be an Engineering Manager (2 points | no comments)
12. Signatures are like backups (10 points | 1 comment)
13. Linux Very Close To Enabling Real-Time "PREEMPT_RT" Support (6 points | no comments)
14. Random access string compression with FSST and Rust (13 points | 7 comments)

16. Windows NT vs. Unix: A design comparison (14 points | 4 comments)
17. QUIC is not Quick Enough over Fast Internet (40 points | 11 comments)
18. Client-side, ad-free dev utils (encoder/decoder, json format/minify, pivot, time convertor, diffs, QR generator, etc.) (11 points | 5 comments)

23. Debugging in the Multiverse (1 points | no comments)
24. Just for Fun. No, Really (25 points | 3 comments)
